thread.title: The best snow broom to have handy for snow storm cleanup
thread.title_full: The best snow broom to have handy for snow storm cleanup

author: AOL Staff
title: The best snow broom to have handy for snow storm cleanup
text: The best snow broom to have handy for snow storm cleanup If you find yourself preparing for a winter storm this weekend, we're right there with you. The weather report is calling for the first major storm of 2024 for parts of the east coast and we are prepping for some inches. Whether that is making sure my hot cocoa is stocked or my snow boots still fit, I am making sure I'm ready for it all. Especially the digging out once the snow stops. [See 3 more]() Cleaning off my car can be a rather unpleasant adventure, but it doesn't have to be. We found one of the handiest gadgets to help make stretching to hit hard-to-reach places a breeze and it's worth every penny. The [Snow Joe 4-in-1 Snow Broom](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-aol&pageId=1p-autolink&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1Nub3ctSm9lLVNKQkxaRC1MRUQtVGVsZXNjb3BpbmctSGVhZGxpZ2h0cy9kcC9CMDFEVElDN0VHP3RhZz1hb2wwMTIzLXAtby02aTktMjAiLCJjb250ZW50VXVpZCI6ImU2ZjY2ZjE1LThjNTgtNDBkMy05ZTU3LWIzN2ZlNWI1Yzc3NyJ9&signature=AQAAAZdd-koC-vq-hwXXjS_Ae3rCACh1UjRpNT8UfiWruRae&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSnow-Joe-SJBLZD-LED-Telescoping-Headlights%2Fdp%2FB01DTIC7EG) will absolutely change the cleanup game with its telescoping handling that will reach up to 52 inches, and the non-abrasive foam head will push heavy, wet snow right off your car. I have one and can't imagine snowstorm clean up without it anymore. Right now, it's on sale for just $14, and if you have an [Amazon Prime membership](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-aol&pageId=1p-autolink&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2FtYXpvbnByaW1lP3RhZz1hb2wwMTIzLXAtby02aTktMjAiLCJjb250ZW50VXVpZCI6ImU2ZjY2ZjE1LThjNTgtNDBkMy05ZTU3LWIzN2ZlNWI1Yzc3NyJ9&signature=AQAAARfqnE-ifcyVttoGpfSyMySGhBskEM0G8-Uoj77YipMM&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Famazonprime), you'll get it ahead of this weekend's storm. This ice scraper/snow broom is just what you need ahead of winter storms. The telescoping handle up to 52 inches so you can get to those hard-to-reach spots on your roof no problem [$14 at Amazon](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B01DTIC7EG&siteId=us-aol&pageId=pnr-product-module&featureId=product-url&itemName=Snow+Joe+LED+4-In-1+Telescoping+Snow+Broom+%2B+Ice+Scraper&merchantName=Amazon&itemSourceId=B01DTIC7EG&brand=Snow+Joe&price=18.97&salePrice=13.99&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1Nub3ctSm9lLVNKQkxaRC1MRUQtVGVsZXNjb3BpbmctSGVhZGxpZ2h0cy9kcC9CMDFEVElDN0VHP3RoPTEmdGFnPWFvbDAxMjMtcC1vLTZpOC0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiZTZmNjZmMTUtOGM1OC00MGQzLTllNTctYjM3ZmU1YjVjNzc3In0&signature=AQAAATZin3qHazJ-ngOui4W4N-Id1hsH0e-5vaZ9UTDbDw83) This scraper is no joke. More than 14,500 shoppers have given it five-star reviews. It's lightweight and super easy to use. It doesn't have the standard brush that are typical on a scraper. The foam-padded panel on one end is designed to let you push piles of snow, even on the hood fo your car and roof without worrying about scratching the paint. It has a swivel head for ease of use and even comes off for easy storage in your garage or car. The other end has a typical scraper for windows and mirrors. There is also an LED light that can help make cleaning off your car in the dark a little easier. This tool isn't something we're only excited about; shoppers can't get enough and their reviews tell you why. "This is so great for clearing off a ton of snow in a hurry," shared a [happy Midwesterner](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-lifestyle&pageId=1p-autolink&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2dwL2N1c3RvbWVyLXJldmlld3MvUjMwUUNEREhBR084R0gvP3RhZz15bGUwMS1wLW8tZGtxLTIwIiwiY29udGVudFV1aWQiOiJmMDE1ZWU2Ny0wZGY4LTRmNjYtOGQyNi0wNDBiOTdhZjI3YmMifQ&signature=AQAAAZhAip8G-lI8C3t91mjc5nAzCs3f8U6lOTY2BWbXABA_&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fcustomer-reviews%2FR30QCDDHAGO8GH%2F&uuid=2E9e01PGIin5iT7b5868). "I live in Michigan and I do not have a garage. This baby clears off inches of snow from my car in no time. I like being able to clear off the top of my car too, so I'm not causing a safety hazard with tons of snow blowing off the top of my car on the highway. (The ice scraper on the other side is helpful too.) I had no trouble with the telescoping handle. I'm able to extend it and compress it with no issues (and I'm just an average middle-aged woman with no super-human strength)." "Living in northern Wisconsin, I wish I had known of these sooner," lamented a [grateful reviewer](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-lifestyle&pageId=1p-autolink&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2dwL2N1c3RvbWVyLXJldmlld3MvUjFET0swT1RQVFNRR0E_dGFnPXlsZTAxLXAtby1ka3EtMjAiLCJjb250ZW50VXVpZCI6ImYwMTVlZTY3LTBkZjgtNGY2Ni04ZDI2LTA0MGI5N2FmMjdiYyJ9&signature=AQAAAa8Lh_IkR6XxDF9uA29dqM9SdKHdCakUC9teiNAiZMJF&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fcustomer-reviews%2FR1DOK0OTPTSQGA&uuid=a1QvTOln4nzo9sEn6868). "They work amazingly. I will never use a regular snowbrush again. These allow me to take a large amount of snow off in one stroke — and I can even reach my SUV roof with the telescoping handle! I also love the material it is made of; the foam does not get wet, so no more throwing a snow-wet brush in my car. I highly recommend it — bought one for myself and three for gifts." "This is the best thing that I have ever tried, and I have tried a lot of different snow removal tools," wrote a [five-star fan](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-lifestyle&pageId=1p-autolink&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2dwL2N1c3RvbWVyLXJldmlld3MvUjMzU1hZTTRWUzMxWlM_dGFnPXlsZTAxLXAtby1ka3EtMjAiLCJjb250ZW50VXVpZCI6ImYwMTVlZTY3LTBkZjgtNGY2Ni04ZDI2LTA0MGI5N2FmMjdiYyJ9&signature=AQAAAeMr4JDGCNFWDsczhw2h4dsP89lzYmWpJygy_tf91olk&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fcustomer-reviews%2FR33SXYM4VS31ZS&uuid=lXUOWr9k5KpkZEK67868). "This has a soft foam texture that does not hurt your car at all, and I have a brand-new car so I am extremely careful with what I use. It can get so much snow at once, and I am short and I can reach everywhere on my SUV. A must-have for anyone who lives in the snow." Looking for more great Amazon deals? Shop our picks below: The reviews quoted above reflect the most recent versions at the time of publication.
